thread.section_title: SA Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SA Expeditions | saexpeditions.com
thread.title: Elizabeth L
thread.title_full: SA Expeditions reviewed by Elizabeth L

author: Elizabeth L
title: Elizabeth L
text: SA EXPEDITIONS was extremely helpful with information and choices planning an 8 day trip to Quito and the Galapagos for 10 friends followed by 3 different post trip excursions (Amazon, Machu Picchu and Patagonia) for members of the group. We were very pleased with the accommodations, the excellent guides and the logistical arrangements made for us. Would definitely us them again if returning to South America.
